chapter.title: Tiles view class definition
chapter.para: As described in the definition of viewResolver, after defining UrlBasedViewResolver, define viewClass as org.springframework.web.servlet.view.tiles2.TilesView like the below code. <bean id="tilesViewResolver" class="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.UrlBasedViewResolver"> <property name="viewClass" value="org.springframework.web.servlet.view.tiles2.TilesView" /> </bean>
